byline.contributor: Matthew Rosenberg and Scott Shane contributed reporting.

abstract: Twitter messages sent by Elton Simpson, one of two men who attacked Garland, Tex, art exhibit featuring cartoon drawings of Prophet Muhammad, appear to link him to Islamic State.
lead_paragraph: Elton Simpson appears to have been part of a network of Islamic State adherents in multiple countries who have encouraged attacks and had highlighted the Texas event as a worthy target.

headline.main: Clues on Twitter Show Ties Between Texas Gunman and ISIS Network
headline.print_headline: Clues on Twitter Show Ties Between Texas Gunman and ISIS Network

snippet: Elton Simpson appears to have been part of a network of Islamic State adherents in multiple countries who have encouraged attacks and had highlighted the Texas event as a worthy target.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
